input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass

Product keywords:
Shade Material: Etched glass.
Shade Color: Satin. 
Distressed: No.
Number of Lights: 1
Connection: Hardwired. 
Plug-In: No. 
Chain or Rod Length: 12".
10 feet of Wire
Requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb
Three Interconnecting 12-Inch stems Included
For Additional Decorative Chain Order: 9100-777
For Additional Stem Order: 9199-777
Canopy Included

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Bring a touch of elegance to your home with the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant. This beautiful pendant features a copper revival finish with satin etched glass, adding a warm and inviting look to any room. The 10 feet of wire and three interconnecting 12-inch stems make it easy to install and perfect for any space. The shade material is etched glass and the shade color is satin. This pendant requires one medium A-line 100-watt maximum bulb and is hardwired. There is no plug-in or chain/rod length. The canopy is included. If you would like to purchase additional decorative chain, please order 9100-777. If you would like to purchase additional stem, please order 9199-777. Distressed: No.
input_text.Response B: Introducing the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolitan One-Light Mini Pendant in the Copper Revival finish with satin etched glass. This pendant light features a sleek design with a copper finish and satin etched glass that will add a touch of modern style to any room in your home. The light is designed with a single light source, making it ideal for task lighting in a kitchen or dining room. The pendant light comes with three interconnecting 12-inch stems, allowing you to customize the length to your exact needs. The shade material is etched glass, providing a warm and inviting glow. The light is hardwired and does not come with a plug, so you will need to connect it to a power source. The canopy is included, and the chain length is 12 inches. You can easily extend the chain to the desired length by ordering additional stems through the numbers listed above. The Sea Gull Lighting Metropolitan collection is a great choice for those who are looking for high-quality lighting solutions that are both stylish and functional. With its sleek design and durable construction, this pendant light will provide years of service. Add a touch of modern style to your home with the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolitan One-Light Mini Pendant.
